title: Account Locked - Unable to Sign In
description: User reports account lock after multiple failed login attempts.

title: Payment Gateway Timeout
description: Transactions not processing due to timeout errors.

title: Invoice Email Not Received
description: Client reports missing invoice email for February.

title: Profile Update Failure
description: Users unable to update address information.

title: Mobile App Crash
description: iOS app crashes when accessing settings page.

title: Refund Request Pending
description: Refund not issued even after confirmation mail.

title: OTP Not Delivered
description: User not receiving OTP for login.

title: Profile Picture Upload Error
description: System throws error while uploading image.

title: No Order Confirmation SMS
description: Customer did not receive SMS after placing order.
